edu.uri.wbl.tex_tronics

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, MqttManagerListener

    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements MqttManagerListener
    This Activity is meant to serve as a demostration to illustrate to the application user the features made available by this app, as well as to contributing developers to understand how to use the BluetoothLeService, MqttManager, and other Services/components contains in this library. Specifically, this application connects to multiple Tex-Tronics products (SmartGloves and SmartSocks), streams sensor data from each of them and relays this information to the cloud via an MQTT connection. Since this demo does not include a BLE scanner, device addresses must be manually inputted to the GattDevices class (as a String).
    Version:
    1.0, 12/04/2017
    Author:
    Matthew Constant, Andrew Peltier, Nathan Mensah, Nick Constant
    See Also:
    Tex-Tronics GitHub Repository, MQTT Essentials, Bluetooth Low Energy: The Developer's Handbook

        private BleUpdateReceiver mBleUpdateReceiver

      • mqttPublish

        private void mqttPublish(java.lang.String data)
        This method publishes a message to the topic specified above. The MQTT Manager must have already connected to use this method.
        Parameters:
        data - String to be published via MQTT
